entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 80 gusting to 100 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 near mainland valleys and inlets early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 70 gusting to 90 this evening then south 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
